attributes.action: postpone foreign aid and use money to help Britain recover from pandemic
attributes.additional_details: Britain has suffered devastating financial losses due to this pandemic. It seems common sense to use the money we would normally give away (currently over 1 billion pounds a month) to what too often seems to be dubious causes, and use the money to help offset the huge financial losses this country has endured
attributes.background: postpone all payments to foreign aid agencies and use the money to help Britain to recover financially from the devastating effects the pandemic has had on the economy
